name: investor_grades
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool crypto_market_data_from_token_metrics.
Tool description: Build cryptocurrency trading strategies based on tested data that actually matters with the Token Metrics Data API.
API description: Fetches investor grades for specified cryptocurrency tokens within a date range.

startdate.description: The start date for the data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

enddate.description: The end date for the data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

tokens.description: A comma-separated list of cryptocurrency tokens for which to fetch investor grades.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is '1000'.
